title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pancetta in a hot pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and mix with cheese.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat and mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Melt butter and add tomato puree.
Simmer the sauce and add grilled chicken.
Stir in cream and cook for 5 more minutes.
